thought: I need to implement the parameters for the Google Drive folder search action to find the folder 'ProAgentWorkspace' by name.
plan: Set searchMethod to 'name' to search by folder name.
Set the queryString to 'ProAgentWorkspace' to find the specific folder.
Set returnAll to false and limit to 1 to get only the first matching folder.
criticism: Currently, the folder search action has no parameters set, so it won't find any folder.

tool_input.comments: Search for folder 'ProAgentWorkspace' in Google Drive by name
TODO: Verify the output contains the folder ID
